PLEASE READ ME!!
----------------

Version 4 of the Auth0.NET SDK only supports OIDC-conformant clients. For more information on OIDC-conformant clients please see https://auth0.com/docs/api-auth/tutorials/adoption/oidc-conformant

If you are not using OIDC-conformant clients, then you should keep on using Version 3.x

If you are upgrading from Version 3.x, please see http://auth0.github.io/auth0.net/migrating.html
